verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and take<WH3947> of them rods<WH4294>, one for each fathers<WH1>' house<WH1004>, of all their princes<WH5387> according to their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>, twelve<WH8147> rods<WH4294>: write<WH3789> thou every man<WH376>'s name<WH8034> upon his rod<WH4294>.
And thou shalt write<WH3789> Aaron<WH175>'s name<WH8034> upon the rod<WH4294> of Levi<WH3878>; for there shall be one<WH259> rod<WH4294> for each head<WH7218> of their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>.
And thou shalt lay them up<WH3240> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> the testimony<WH5715>, where I meet with you<WH3259>.

And it shall come to pass<WH4294>, that the rod of the man<WH376> whom I shall choose<WH977> shall bud<WH6524>: and I will make to cease<WH7918> from me the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, which they murmur against you<WH3885>.

And Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and all their princes<WH5387> gave<WH5414> him rods<WH4294>, for each prince<WH5387> one<WH259>, according to their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>, even twelve<WH6240> rods<WH4294>: and the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> was among<WH8432> their rods<WH4294>.
And Moses<WH4872> laid up<WH3240> the rods<WH4294> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> in the tent<WH168> of the testimony<WH5715>.

And it came to pass on the morrow<WH4283>, that Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of the testimony<WH5715>; and<WH4294>, behold, the rod of Aaron<WH175> for the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> was budded<WH6524>, and put forth<WH3318> buds<WH6525>, and produced<WH6692> blossoms<WH6731>, and bare<WH1580> ripe almonds<WH8247>.

And Moses<WH4872> brought out<WH3318> all the rods<WH4294> from before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> unto all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: and they looked<WH7200>, and took<WH3947> every man<WH376> his rod<WH4294>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Put<WH7725> back<WH7725> the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> before<WH6440> the testimony<WH5715>, to be kept<WH4931> for a token<WH226> against the children of rebellion<WH4805>; that thou mayest make an end<WH3615> of their murmurings<WH8519> against me<WH4191>, that they die not.
Thus did<WH6213> Moses<WH4872>: as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him<WH6213>, so did he.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>, Behold<WH1478>, we perish, we are undone<WH6>, we are all undone<WH6>.
Every one that cometh near<WH7131>, that cometh near unto the tabernacle<WH4908> of Jehovah<WH3068>, dieth<WH4191>: shall we perish<WH8552> all of us<WH1478>?
